description.brazilian: Fale com todos sobre o intercâmbio.
description.english: Talk with everyone about the exchange.
description.french: Parler de l'échange avec tout le monde.
description.german: Sprich mit allen über den Austausch.
description.italian: Parla con tutti dello scambio.
description.japanese: 文化的交流について全員と話す。
description.schinese: 与所有人探讨互通一事。
description.spanish: Habla con todo el mundo sobre el intercambio.

description.english: Complete the Notebook.
description.french: Remplir le carnet.
description.italian: Completa il taccuino.
description.japanese: ノートにある依頼をすべてクリアする。
description.spanish: Completa la libreta.

description.english: Untangle the story of the brothers.
description.french: Démêler l'histoire des frères.
description.italian: Scopri la storia dei fratelli.
description.japanese: 兄弟の物語を解き明かす。
description.spanish: Descubre la historia de los hermanos.

displayName.french: Le facteur sonne toujours deux fois
displayName.italian: Il postino suona sempre due volte
displayName.japanese: 郵便配達員は二度ベルを鳴らす
displayName.spanish: El cartero siempre llama dos veces

description.brazilian: Leia e entregue todas as cartas do Buddy.
description.english: Read and deliver all of Buddy's letters.
description.french: Lire et remettre toutes les lettres de Buddy.
description.german: Lies alle Briefe von Buddy und stelle sie zu.
description.italian: Leggi e consegna tutte le lettere di Buddy.
description.japanese: バディの手紙をすべて読み、届ける。
description.russian: Прочтите и доставьте все письма Бадди.
description.schinese: 查看并投递巴迪的所有信件。
description.spanish: Lee y entrega todas las cartas de Buddy.
description.turkish: Buddy'nin tüm mektuplarını okuyup teslim et.

displayName.english: Home Is Where the Heart Is
displayName.french: Le foyer, c'est là où se trouve le cœur
displayName.german: Zu Hause ist, wo das Herz ist
displayName.spanish: El hogar es donde mora el corazón

description.english: Complete the game.
description.french: Terminer le jeu.
description.italian: Completa il gioco.
description.japanese: ゲームをクリアする。
description.spanish: Completa el juego.

description.brazilian: Curta o jogo sem pressa (mais de 15 horas de tempo de jogo).
description.english: Enjoy the game at a leasurely pace (more than 15 hours play time.)
description.french: Profiter du jeu à votre rythme (plus de 15 heures de jeu).
description.german: Genieße das Spiel in einem gemütlichen Tempo. (Mehr als 15 Stunden Spielzeit).
description.italian: Goditi il ​​gioco a un ritmo rilassato (più di 15 ore di gioco).
description.japanese: ゲームをのんびりプレイする（プレイ時間が15時間を超える）。
description.koreana: 이 게임을 느긋하게 즐기세요(플레이 시간 15시간 초과).
description.russian: Пройдите игру без спешки в свое удовольствие (больше 15 часов прохождения).
description.schinese: 悠闲享受游戏（游戏时长超过15小时）。
description.spanish: Disfruta del juego con muuucha calma (más de 15 horas).
description.turkish: Oyunu, tadını çıkararak ve yavaş yavaş oyna (15 saatten fazla oyna.)

displayName.brazilian: Justiça é um prato que se come morno
displayName.english: Justice Is a Dish Best Served Warm
displayName.french: La justice est un plat qui se mange chaud
displayName.german: Gerechtigkeit serviert man am besten warm

displayName.japanese: 正義を為すなら早いうちに
displayName.spanish: La justicia es un plato que se sirve caliente

description.brazilian: Deixe a Mareaux ciente de todos os passos da procura da Pedra Azul.
description.english: Update Mareaux about every step of the search for the Blue Rock.
description.french: Informer Mareaux à chaque étape de votre recherche de la pierre bleue.
description.german: Informiere Mareaux über jeden Schritt der Suche nach dem blauen Stein.
description.italian: Aggiorna Mareaux su ogni fase della ricerca della roccia blu.
description.japanese: 青い岩探しの進捗をマローに毎回報告する。
description.koreana: 파란 돌을 찾는 동안 모든 단계마다 마로에게 보고하세요.
description.russian: Сообщите Моро о каждом шаге в поисках синего камня.
description.schinese: 向玛奥通报搜索蓝色岩石过程中的每一个步骤。
description.spanish: Avisa a Mareaux de cada paso que des en la búsqueda de la roca azul.
description.turkish: Mavi Taş arayışının her adımını Mareaux'ya bildir.

description.brazilian: Experimente a pista de esqui do Slippie.
description.english: Try out Slippie's ski slope.
description.french: Essayer la piste de ski de Slippie.
description.italian: Prova la pista da sci di Slippie.
description.japanese: スリッピーのスキースロープを試す。
description.spanish: Prueba el descenso de esquí de Slippie.

description.brazilian: Tente sair do escritório da SoAcqua 3 vezes.
description.english: Attempt to leave the All Water Office 3 times.
description.french: Essayer de quitter le bureau de Toutes Eaux à 3 reprises.
description.german: Versuche dreimal, das All-Water-Büro zu verlassen.
description.italian: Tenta di uscire dall'ufficio di Solacqua 3 volte.
description.japanese: オールウォーター事務所から3回立ち去ろうとする。
description.russian: Попытайтесь уйти из офиса «Только вода» 3 раза.
description.schinese: 试图离开水下交通办公室3次。
description.spanish: Intenta salir de la oficina de Todo Agua 3 veces.
description.turkish: Hep Su Ofisinden 3 kez çıkmaya çalış.

description.brazilian: Escute todas as fofocas no Espaço Cervejeiro da Gertrude.
description.english: Listen to all of the gossip at Gertrude's Bierzone.
description.french: Écouter tous les potins à la Brasserie de Gertrude.
description.german: Höre dir den ganzen Klatsch und Tratsch in Gertrudes Bierzone an.
description.italian: Ascolta tutti i pettegolezzi all'Angolo della birra di Gertrude.
description.japanese: ガートルードビールゾーンですべてのゴシップを聞く。
description.koreana: 거트루드 비어존에 대한 모든 소문을 들으세요.
description.russian: Послушайте все сплетни в «Пивной теме Гертруды».
description.schinese: 聆听格特鲁德酒馆中的所有八卦闲聊。
description.spanish: Escucha todos los cotilleos en la Zona Bier de Gertrude.

description.english: Watch TV for 10 minutes.
description.french: Regarder la télévision pendant 10 minutes.
description.italian: Guarda la TV per 10 minuti.
description.japanese: テレビを10分以上視聴する。
description.spanish: Ve la tele durante 10 minutos.

description.brazilian: Convença o Warren a mudar a Salsicháguas para a Caverna.
description.english: Convince Warren to move Water Wieners to the Cave.
description.french: Convaincre Warren d'installer la Saucisse aquatique dans la grotte.
description.german: Überrede Warren, mit Wasser-Wiener in die Höhle zu ziehen.
description.italian: Convinci Warren a spostare Wurstelacqua nella grotta.
description.japanese: ウォーレンを説得し、水煮ウィンナーの屋台を洞窟に移転させる。
description.koreana: 워렌에게 수중 소시지를 동굴로 옮기도록 설득하세요.
description.russian: Убедите Уоррена перенести «Водные сардельки» в Пещеру.
description.schinese: 说服沃伦将维纳烤肠店迁至洞穴。
description.spanish: Convence a Warren de que traslade el Salchichagua a la cueva.
description.turkish: Su Sosisleri'ni Mağaraya taşıması için Warren'ı ikna et.

description.brazilian: Ajude o Slippie a se organizar no Distrito de Energia.
description.english: Help Slippie set up in the Energy Disctrict.
description.french: Aider Slippie à s'installer au secteur de l'énergie.
description.german: Hilf Slippie, sich im Energiesektor einzurichten.
description.italian: Aiuta Slippie a organizzarsi nel Distretto energetico.
description.japanese: エネルギー地区でスリッピーの準備を手伝う。
description.russian: Помогите Слипи с работами в энергетическом районе.
description.schinese: 帮助斯利皮在能源区张罗事务。
description.spanish: Ayuda a Slippie a prepararse en el Distrito Energético.
description.turkish: Slippie'nin Enerji Bölgesi'ne kurulmasına yardım et.

description.brazilian: Tente pegar a amostra diretamente com a Brigitte.
description.english: Try to pick up the sample directly from Brigitte.
description.french: Essayer de récupérer l'échantillon directement auprès de Brigitte.
description.german: Versuche, die Probe direkt bei Brigitte abzuholen.
description.italian: Prova a ritirare il campione direttamente presso Brigitte.
description.japanese: ブリジットから直接サンプルを受け取ろうとする。
description.russian: Попытайтесь достать образец прямо у Бригитты.
description.schinese: 试图直接接过碧姬的样本。
description.spanish: Intenta recoger la muestra yendo a ver a Brigitte directamente.

description.english: Listen to the Announcer under the shower.
description.french: Écouter le présentateur sous la douche.
description.german: Lausche dem Ansager unter der Dusche.
description.italian: Ascolta il presentatore sotto la doccia.
description.japanese: シャワーを浴びながらアナウンサーの声を聴く。
description.koreana: 쏟아지는 물을 맞으며 아나운서의 말을 들으세요.
description.russian: Прослушайте объявление по громкой связи в душе.
description.spanish: Escucha al locutor bajo la ducha.

description.brazilian: Jogue "Rapid Fly Zone Force" por 2 minutos.
description.english: Play Rapid Fly Zone Force for 2 Minutes.
description.french: Jouer à Rapid Fly Zone Force pendant 2 minutes.
description.german: Spiele zwei Minuten lang „Rapid Fly Zone Force“.
description.italian: Gioca a "Rapid Fly Zone Force" per 2 minuti.
description.japanese: 「ラピッドフライゾーンフォース」を2分間プレイする。
description.schinese: 游玩“竞速飞行区队”2分钟。
description.spanish: Juega a «Rapid Fly Zone Force» durante 2 minutos.
description.turkish: 2 dakika boyunca "Hızlı Uçuş Alanı Kuvveti" oyna.

description.english: Participate in the station jog.
description.french: Participer à la course.
description.italian: Partecipa alla sessione di jogging della stazione.
description.japanese: ステーションジョギングに参加する。
description.spanish: Participa en la carrera por la estación.

displayName.schinese: 大明星欧纳特粉丝俱乐部

description.english: Watch Onat's stage performance.
description.french: Regarder le spectacle d'Onat.
description.italian: Assisti allo spettacolo di Onat.

description.schinese: 观看欧纳特的现场表演。
description.spanish: Ve la actuación de Onat.

description.brazilian: Viaje pela primeira vez num tubo da SoAcqua.
description.english: Make your first trip on the All Water tube.
description.french: Prendre le tubulaire de Toutes Eaux.
description.german: Mach deine erste Fahrt mit dem All-Water-Röhrensystem.
description.italian: Fai il tuo primo viaggio attraverso la tubolare di Solacqua.
description.japanese: オールウォーターチューブシステムで初めて移動する。
description.schinese: 首次乘坐水下交通的管道交通。
description.spanish: Haz tu primer viaje en el sistema tubular de Todo Agua.
